General.Name: Zhonglu Co Ltd B
General.Description: Zhonglu.Co.,Ltd manufactures and sells bicycles in China. The company offers bicycles and bicycle-related parts, mopeds, manual and electric wheelchairs, and other special vehicles; sells rice leather; bowling equipment; and constructs and operates bowling alleys. It also engages in the public bicycle rental services; and foreign equity investment business. The company exports its products. Zhonglu.Co.,Ltd was founded in 1940 and is based in Shanghai, China.
